game.title: Don't Starve: Pocket Edition
game.description: Don't Starve: Pocket Edition is a uncompromising wilderness survival game full of science and magic. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land.

specifications.languages: English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Italiano, Polski, Português, Русский, 日本語, 한국어, 简体中文, 繁體中文

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
